name: nuxt-phosphor-icons
description: An easier way of using @phosphor-icons/vue in your Nuxt project!

scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare docs && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release:major: pnpm prepack && changelogen --release --major --output docs/content/release-notes.md && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish
scripts.release:minor: pnpm prepack && changelogen --release --minor --output docs/content/release-notes.md && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish
scripts.release:patch: pnpm prepack && changelogen --release --patch --output docs/content/release-notes.md && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish
